# Transaction.AdvancedCommerceInfo.Offer

**Structure**

Information about the offer that was redeemed as part of the purchase.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Offer
```

## Structures

- **Transaction.AdvancedCommerceInfo.Offer.Reason**: The reasons why subscription offers are applied to the purchase of auto-renewable subscriptions.

## Instance Properties

- **period**: The duration of the offer.
- **periodCount**: The number of periods the system applies the offer.
- **price**: The discounted price under the offer.
- **reason**: The reason the offer was applied.

## Structures

- **Transaction.AdvancedCommerceInfo.Item**: The developer-defined product that was purchased.
- **Transaction.AdvancedCommerceInfo.Refund**: Information about refunds that were issued as part of this transaction.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
